name: Quoridor
description:
For my Artificial Intelligence class a few years back, my group and I decided to create an AI for a board game called Quoridor. This game was created in a few months and is playable up to 4 players or 1v1 with the AI.  You can also sit back and watch  the AI play against itself to learn how it thinks.  Visuals are very basic as the main focus was the AI, but it is fully playable so enjoy!

Code and contributors can be found here: https://github.com/ddnguyen1494/quoridor-ai/graphs/contributors
